ygData.subject: Pred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at him wide eyed. You like me? It struck her like a lighting bolt. She forgot about her head hurting and looked at him with suprize and shock

::KitKat::

She looked at him wide eyed. "You like me?" It struck her like a 
lighting bolt. She forgot about her head hurting and looked at him 
with suprize and shock on her face.  
"Relationship? You.....me....relationship?" She flopped back on her 
bed. "You like me?" She couldn't get over what he just told 
her. "Well..I..uh" She sat up and looked at him. She smiled and 
shrugger her shoulders."Why not. If you want to, sure, I"m game." She 
smiled. She was actually kind of glad that someone liked her at all, 
let alone a relationship. She chuckled,"If this is what happened when 
I go drinking, I may do it more often." She laughed.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He allowed a smile to appeare. He had liked it last night.
> "Well, you sure wern't dreaming. I'm sure you know that I really 
like
> you. If you don't want that kind of a relationship, its ok. I 
understand
> that you were drunk." He said, hopeing she did want a relationship.
> He didn't just like her, he loved her. And he really enjoyed last 
night.
